items.sentence: Tom was the one who recommended this restaurant to me.
Tom was the one who suggested that I go out with Mary.
The last thing I want to do now is clean the bathroom.
Stop teasing Mary. Can\'t you see she\'s going to cry?
Tom didn\'t know who Mary wanted to go to Boston with.
Didn\'t you know Tom was going to Australia with Mary?
Didn\'t you know that Tom passed away three years ago?
The only place Tom hadn\'t looked was in the basement.
When did Tom and Mary start going out with each other?
When was the last time you did that with your friends?
